trans-unit.source: Keyword Reference

seg-source.mrk: Keyword Reference

target.mrk: Keyword Reference

trans-unit.source: Contains information used when searching for a list-view item

seg-source.mrk: Contains information used when searching for a list-view item

target.mrk: Contains information used when searching for a list-view item

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: Type of search to perform. This member can be set to one or more of the following values:

seg-source.mrk: Type of search to perform.
This member can be set to one or more of the following values:

target.mrk: Type of search to perform.
This member can be set to one or more of the following values:

trans-unit.source: $LVFI_PARAM - Searches for a match between this structure's Param member and the Param member of an item. If $LVFI_PARAM is specified, all other flags are ignored.

seg-source.mrk: $LVFI_PARAM - Searches for a match between this structure's Param member and the Param member of an item.
If $LVFI_PARAM is specified, all other flags are ignored.

target.mrk: $LVFI_PARAM - Searches for a match between this structure's Param member and the Param member of an item.
If $LVFI_PARAM is specified, all other flags are ignored.

trans-unit.source: $LVFI_PARTIAL - Checks to see if the item text begins with the string pointed to by the Text member. This value implies use of $LVFI_STRING.

seg-source.mrk: $LVFI_PARTIAL - Checks to see if the item text begins with the string pointed to by the Text member.
This value implies use of $LVFI_STRING.

target.mrk: $LVFI_PARTIAL - Checks to see if the item text begins with the string pointed to by the Text member.
This value implies use of $LVFI_STRING.

trans-unit.source: $LVFI_STRING - Searches based on the item text. Unless additional values are specified, the item text of the matching item must exactly match the string pointed to by the Text member.

seg-source.mrk: $LVFI_STRING - Searches based on the item text.
Unless additional values are specified, the item text of the matching item must exactly match the string pointed to by the Text member.

target.mrk: $LVFI_STRING - Searches based on the item text.
Unless additional values are specified, the item text of the matching item must exactly match the string pointed to by the Text member.

trans-unit.source: $LVFI_SUBSTRING - Equivalent to $LVFI_PARTIAL Windows Vista or later.

seg-source.mrk: $LVFI_SUBSTRING - Equivalent to $LVFI_PARTIAL Windows Vista or later.

target.mrk: $LVFI_SUBSTRING - Equivalent to $LVFI_PARTIAL Windows Vista or later.

trans-unit.source: $LVFI_WRAP - Continues the search at the beginning if no match is found

seg-source.mrk: $LVFI_WRAP - Continues the search at the beginning if no match is found

target.mrk: $LVFI_WRAP - Continues the search at the beginning if no match is found

trans-unit.source: $LVFI_NEARESTXY - Finds the item nearest to the position specified in the X and Y members, in the direction specified by the Direction member. This flag is supported only by large icon and small icon modes.

seg-source.mrk: $LVFI_NEARESTXY - Finds the item nearest to the position specified in the X and Y members, in the direction specified by the Direction member.
This flag is supported only by large icon and small icon modes.

target.mrk: $LVFI_NEARESTXY - Finds the item nearest to the position specified in the X and Y members, in the direction specified by the Direction member.
This flag is supported only by large icon and small icon modes.

trans-unit.source: Address of a string to compare with the item text. It is valid if $LVFI_STRING or $LVFI_PARTIAL is set in the Flags member.

seg-source.mrk: Address of a string to compare with the item text.
It is valid if $LVFI_STRING or $LVFI_PARTIAL is set in the Flags member.

target.mrk: Address of a string to compare with the item text.
It is valid if $LVFI_STRING or $LVFI_PARTIAL is set in the Flags member.

trans-unit.source: Value to compare with the Param member of an item's $LVITEM structure. It is valid only if $LVFI_PARAM is set in the flags member.

seg-source.mrk: Value to compare with the Param member of an item's $LVITEM structure.
It is valid only if $LVFI_PARAM is set in the flags member.

target.mrk: Value to compare with the Param member of an item's $LVITEM structure.
It is valid only if $LVFI_PARAM is set in the flags member.

trans-unit.source: Initial X,Y search position. It is valid only if $LVFI_NEARESTXY is set in the Flags member.

seg-source.mrk: Initial X,Y search position.
It is valid only if $LVFI_NEARESTXY is set in the Flags member.

target.mrk: Initial X,Y search position.
It is valid only if $LVFI_NEARESTXY is set in the Flags member.

trans-unit.source: Virtual key code that specifies the direction to search. The following codes are supported:

seg-source.mrk: Virtual key code that specifies the direction to search.
The following codes are supported:

target.mrk: Virtual key code that specifies the direction to search.
The following codes are supported:

target.mrk: VK_LEFT

target.mrk: VK_RIGHT

seg-source.mrk: VK_DOWN

target.mrk: VK_DOWN

trans-unit.source: VK_HOME

seg-source.mrk: VK_HOME

target.mrk: VK_HOME

trans-unit.source: VK_END

seg-source.mrk: VK_END

target.mrk: VK_END

trans-unit.source: VK_PRIOR

seg-source.mrk: VK_PRIOR

target.mrk: VK_PRIOR

trans-unit.source: VK_NEXT

seg-source.mrk: VK_NEXT

target.mrk: VK_NEXT

trans-unit.source: This member is valid only if $LVFI_NEARESTXY is set in the flags member.

seg-source.mrk: This member is valid only if $LVFI_NEARESTXY is set in the flags member.

target.mrk: This member is valid only if $LVFI_NEARESTXY is set in the flags member.
